name: The Legacy: The Tree of Might
description: Open the Gates to another worlds! Research into the causes of the mysterious epidemic will have rather unpredictable consequences… “The Legacy: The Tree of Might” is an adventure game in the genre of Hidden Object, with plenty of mini-games and puzzles, unforgettable characters and complicated quests.
minimum_requirements: OS: XP/Vista/7/8/10 Processor: 1.6 GHz Memory: 1024 MB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1300 MB available space
